titles: Prince Henries obsequies or Mournefull elegies vpon his death vvith a supposed inter-locution betweene the ghost of Prince Henrie and Great Brittaine. By George Wyther.
author: Wither, George, 1588-1667.
publisher: Printed by Ed: Allde, for Arthur Iohnson, at the white Horse neere vnto the great north doore of Saint Paul,
notes: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

keywords: Henry Frederick, --  Prince of Wales, 1594-1612 --  Death and burial --  Poetry --  Early works to 1800.
